name: Romy Taylor
bio: Romy Taylor is a Leeds-based singer, songwriter and performer. Romy's music mixes contemporary jazz instrumentals with heartfelt lyrics and vocals into epic ballads and groovy tunes. Taking inspiration from artists like Nai Palm, Lucy Rose, Bj√∂rk and Minnie Riperton, she combines an atmospheric feel with catchy sing-along melodies.

name: Michael Cable
bio: Psychedelic indie duo bringing dreamy soundscapes and hypnotic rhythms to Sunday mornings. Their blend of shoegaze and folk creates an otherworldly atmosphere perfect for a hangover cure.

name: Marcus King
bio: Jazz-influenced guitarist and vocalist Marcus King brings smooth grooves and soulful melodies. His performances blend contemporary R&B with classic jazz standards, creating a perfect Sunday morning vibe.

name: Luna Sinclair
bio: Indie folk artist Luna Sinclair weaves ethereal melodies with introspective lyrics. Her haunting voice and delicate guitar work create intimate sonic landscapes perfect for contemplative Sunday mornings.

name: The Midnight Owls
bio: Alt-country trio bringing harmony-rich storytelling and warm acoustic arrangements. Their blend of Americana and indie rock creates the perfect soundtrack for coffee and recovery.

name: Echo Rivers
bio: Electronic-influenced singer-songwriter Echo Rivers combines organic instruments with subtle synths and loops. Their experimental approach to folk music creates unique atmospheric experiences.
